---
title: "McCarthy Sign (Hip)"
---


# Technique

- Supine @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Move the hip from *flexion/adduction/IR* to *extension/abduction/ER* @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

A test is considered positive with:

- Reproduction of mechanical symptoms @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
    - Click
    - Clunk
- Provocation of anterior pain @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
